sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState, useCallback } from 'react'; import '../styles/CloudShooter.css'; import { AZURE_ICON_CATEGORIES, SERVICE_MAPPINGS } from '../services/IconResolver'; import { soundManager } from '../services/SoundManager'; const CloudShooter = () => { // ... existing state declarations ... return (

AZURE CLOUD SHOOTER

PLAYER:
{playerName}
👾 Score:
{score} 🕹️ {soundsLoaded && ( )}
TIME:
Time: {timeLeft}s

HOW TO SCORE:

  • • Hit correct icon: +5 points
  • • Height bonus: up to +20
  • • Wrong hit: -5 points
  • • Tip: Shoot icons as high as possible!

HIGH SCORES

    {highScores.map((entry, index) => (
  • {entry.name}: {entry.score}
    • ))}
{currentMission.text && (

CURRENT MISSION

{currentMission.text}
)}
); }; export default CloudShooter;
